name: passport-google-auth
description: Google (OAuth2) authentication strategy for Passport and Node.js.

scripts.test-travis: node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks --reporter spec test/ && node ./node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint --show-non-errors . && node ./node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs .
scripts.test-ci: node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report cobertura -- --check-leaks  --timeout 60000 --reporter xunit-file test/ && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js report lcov
scripts.analyze-ci: node ./node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint --reporter=jslint --show-non-errors .  > jshint.xml | echo 'yay' && jscs . --reporter checkstyle > checkstyle.xml | echo 'yay'
